news_header: Microsoft's Majorana 1 chip aims to accelerate quantum computing for solving industrial-scale problems in years.
news_original_title: Powerful quantum computers in years not decades, says Microsoft
news_text: Microsoft has introduced the Majorana 1 chip, which it claims will enable faster development of quantum computers capable of solving significant real-world problems within years. This chip utilizes a new material to create a topological conductor, potentially revolutionizing computing similar to semiconductors. Experts remain cautious, emphasizing the need for more data and further development.
